newsitem.title: EGYPT: Bomb hoax delays Paris-Cairo flight.
newsitem.headline: Bomb hoax delays Paris-Cairo flight.

text.p: A bomb hoax in Paris held up an EgyptAir plane for about 15 hours on Sunday evening, Cairo airport sources said on Monday.
The Airbus was to have taken off at 6.15 p.m. Paris time (1715 GMT) but will now arrive in Cairo at 3 p.m. local (1300 GMT), they said.
The French authorities disembarked the 325 passengers and searched the plane after an anonymous telephone caller said there was a bomb on the plane. They found nothing.
